img_above_text:
After defeating the boss, climb the arm that touches the ground and you'll meet the monkey again. Let the cutscene play and you'll get the Skandha of Consciousness.
## How to Use the Five Skandhas
img_below_text:
With all five in your inventory, go to Xu Dog and deliver the Skandhas. You'll then have the option to tell Xu Dog to make the Five Skandhas Pill. Receiving this will boost your health, mana, and stamina.
The Five Skandhas

img_summary: The image depicts the player character interacting with Xu Dog, a key NPC in the game. The menu on the left shows options, with "Show the Five Skandhas" highlighted, indicating the player is about to deliver the Five Skandhas. This action is part of the quest to create the Five Skandhas Pill, which boosts health, mana, and stamina. The scene emphasizes the culmination of collecting the Skandhas and advancing the narrative.
